readability_reflection: Concatenation was more readable, especially if you made the strings variables, because it was more condensed. With interpolation, you could be unsure whether parenthesis or brackets are part of the string.
preference_rationale: Probably concatenation since I am more familiar with it. I should practice interpolation though.
learning_curve: Being familiar with string concatenation allowed me to understand those questions more quickly. I am unsure of the rules of interpolation and therefore my answers are half-guesses.
suggestions_improvement: I'm not sure, they're both already pretty readable.
